casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolinaz
v.
Harley Ray ALLIGOOD, Jr. No. 331P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Harley Ray Alligood, Jr., for Alligood, Harley Ray, Jr. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of September 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Beaufort County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
